TESSERACT_PATH.description: Path to the Tesseract installation | Default: Default path to the local tesseract installation, change the user here.

HOLD_RIGHT.description: Use True when holding right mouse button to go into scope, use False when going into scope on press | default: True

QUIT_KEY.description: A key used to stop the program | Default: 'None'

SENSITIVITY.description: The sensitivity in the apex settings. This is needed to move the mouse at the right speed | Default: 5

TRACKER_DELAY.description: Time in seconds between checks of the held weapon. This is to save recources | Default: 0.5

WINDOW_SIZE.description: Size of the window in Pixel | Default: '400x300'

APEX_MONITOR.description: Which monitor apex is played on | Default: 1

UI_MONITOR.description: Which monitor the ui is printed on, this is for resolution purposes | Default: 1

AUTO-DETECT-RESOLUTION.description: Used to specify custom resolution when you dont want the program to auto-detect it. Set the AUTO-DETECT property to false and enter the wanted custom resolution in x and y. | Default: {'AUTO-DETECT': true, 'WIDTH': null, 'HEIGHT': null}
